title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1050.8 - Weapons and other dangerous instruments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1050.8 - Weapons and other dangerous instruments

State Regulations
(a) No firearms
or other weapon s (as the term is used in the New York State Penal Law) may be
carried in or on any facility or conveyance except as permitted by
law. (b) No explosives or other
highly combustible materials, or radioactive materials, may be carried on or in
any facility or conveyance, except as authorized by the
authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1050.8

Amended

New

York State Register May 17, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 20, eff. 5/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
